citations.narrative:
The facility is overdue in performing the annual review of the contingency plan. The last review was documented as
conducted on June 14, 2023.
Without a regular, annual review of the contingency plan, necessary revisions could be overlooked due to changes in
circumstances or operations since the last review. A delay in reviewing the plan and updating as needed could cause
animals to suffer illness, injury or death due to unpreparedness should an emergency or disaster strike. The registrant
must conduct and document a review of the contingency plan at least once annually; any changes made during this
review must be communicated to employees through documented training within 30 days of making the changes.
TO BE CORRECTED BY 07/19/2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
